initial_reviews.review_title: The best tool that has given my business a plus.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesNexus?
I like to use this system for its versatility and friendly interface, which allows orderly management and automate some marketing functions that usually take up a lot of time, with Sales Nexus CRM allowed us to improve sales management and optimize campaigns of marketing.

I also like the attention provided by the technical support team, which is a very professional, attentive and patient team that has managed to resolve all the errors that have arisen from the problem and the mistakes made by my work team.

What do you dislike about SalesNexus?
At the moment I have no problems with the system, however, I think you can improve the interface a bit and add several functions. This was recommended to the technical support team and they were left to study the proposal and give me an answer as soon as possible.

Recommendations to others considering SalesNexus:
Without a doubt, I recommend this system since it has been able to adapt to the rhythms that this type of business demands, acquiring it will represent your most important investment that will be able to return your capital in a short time.

What problems is SalesNexus solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thanks to this system we have been able to make decisions in a timely manner that have benefited my company in productivity and in turn in profitability.

Likewise, it has allowed us to know the acceptability of our products and services with our clients, thus achieving the conquest of potential customers.

There are many programs that promise a lot but Sales Nexus CRM has been the one that has fulfilled all its functions to the letter.

initial_reviews.review_title: My multiple years of sales nexus experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesNexus?
For those that cannot afford the InfusionSoft type products, this fits in fine.  It has always been a great CRM and the email marketing is good enough to automate things well.  I use campaigns on a weekly basis, as I send out security bulletins to my list.

What do you dislike about SalesNexus?
I currently have a one for one relationship with workflows and campaigns.  I do not see where you would ever have a separate campaign using the same workflow.  If it were to do that then you could have used the original campaign.  I believe having workflows and campaigns complicate matters.  There have been many other things I have found over the year but I did not document them.

Recommendations to others considering SalesNexus:
If you can't afford a top of the line Email Marketing System then this is an awesome product.  It is much better than average and it will do what you need it to do, except do certain automated things like if someone clicks on this then we should remove them from X campaign.  In other words if you are marketing to someone and then they become your client, it will not automatically remove all of the marketing campaigns the client is connected to.  That is what I high end product does.  So you will need to add that to your own internal processes.  I'm renewing my subscription if that helps!

What problems is SalesNexus solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated email marketing, and activities that should be performed daily from a CRM perspective.

initial_reviews.review_title: SalesNexus User Of Over A Decade- Highly Recommended
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesNexus?
Usability, search and sorting capabilities, unlimited customization.

What do you dislike about SalesNexus?
I wish there was an inbox for email.  It has some great email functionality, but to see all of your incoming emails in an "inbox" format, you must "marry" it to your currently used email platform.

Recommendations to others considering SalesNexus:
Get a free trial and give it a try...it has been perfect for our small company's needs.

What problems is SalesNexus solving and how is that benefiting you?
We manage thousands of leads with a very small number of people.  Nothing slips through the cracks!  The scheduling of following up, combined with their highly customizable campaigns, you can keep many thousands of prospects in the loop effortlessly.
